#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm> 
#include <iomanip> 

 
using namespace std;

long int maxx(long int x, long int y)
{
    return (x>y)?x:y;
}

int main()
{       
  
  int n,i,t=1;
  cin>>n;
  while(n!=0)
  { int a[n];
    long int sum=0,y,ans=0;
   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
 {  cin>>a[i];
   sum=sum+a[i];
 }
 y=sum/n;
 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
 {
     ans=ans+abs(y-a[i]);
 }
  cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<ans/2<<".\n";
    cin>>n;
    t=t+1;
  }
 
	return 0;
	
}
